Our Pork

The tastiest eggs you will ever eat. These eggs make the best cooking. Our Free Range chickens enjoy scratching about daily in fresh grass in their own paddocks. Housed safely at night in their sheds, they can move about freely and easily, roost and lay their eggs. You will always see the odd one wandering about the farm in the daytime. Our chickens enjoy a natural as possible life on our farm.

Why Choose Us?

  • Premium quality products

  • Five star hygiene rated
  • Value for money
